name: Christmas Land: Opposite Worlds
description:
Christmas Land: Opposite Worlds is a third person solo game where you can choose to play with an elf girl or a hitman living in two opposite worlds where each of the two have different objectives and abilities but they will try to meet at the end to the same objective, can you figure out what is it?

key Features

multiple Weapons to Master

diffirent Assasination Types

ice Skating

You can choose from various hoverboards to enjoy skating on ice and perform amazing air flips.
Are you a good skater?

become A Great Dancer

You can choose the dance that you will be performing according to the music that will be played in the club.
Can you keep it up with the other dancers and win the challenge?

sing With Your band

There will be many songs that you can perform with your band in front of the audience.
Will you impress them with your performing?

defeat the Party Guards

The party has begun, but the guards of the palace will not let you enter the party and will try to kick you out.
Can you defeat them all and save the party?snowball and Donuts Fight]

And Much More Is Waiting For You to Explore.
